document.full_text: president rafael correa vowed a shake-up of ecuador's courts after a referendum strengthened his grip on the south american opec member nation while heightening foes' fears of autocratic rule.
document.title: ecuador leader plans court revamp after vote boost
lines_and_colors: president rafael correa vowed a shake-up of ecuador's courts after a referendum strengthened his grip on the south american opec member nation while heightening foes' fears of autocratic rule.
